location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: This letter concerns a petition from Buksha Khammum, widow of Aga Mohumed Bahbannee, dated 12 December 1819. William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, expresses doubts about being able to help the widow, as her property is involved with the share of others. However, he promises to do all in his power as soon as other, more important business will allow him.
